  • Constructor Details

    • XboxGamepad

      public XboxGamepad(int port)
      Create with no curve. Not recommended, specify deadband
      Parameters:
      port - DS Port of gamepad

    • XboxGamepad

      public XboxGamepad(int port, double xDeadband, double yDeadband)
      Create with a default smoothCubic Curve
      Parameters:
      port - DS Port of gamepad
      xDeadband - deadband value for x-axis (0.05 recommended)
      yDeadband - deadband value for y-axis (0.05 recommended)

    • XboxGamepad

      public XboxGamepad(int port, double leftXDeadband, double leftYDeadband, double rightXDeadband, double rightYDeadband)
      Create with default smoothCubic Curve with separate left and right dead bands
      Parameters:
      port - DS Port of gamepad
      leftXDeadband - deadband value for left stick x-axis
      leftYDeadband - deadband value for left stick y-axis
      rightXDeadband - deadband value for right stick x-axis
      rightYDeadband - deadband value for right stick y-axis

    • XboxGamepad

      public XboxGamepad(int port, Curve xCurve, Curve yCurve)
      Create with custom user-specified curves
      Parameters:
      port - DS Port of gamepad
      xCurve - Curve to adjust X Axis
      yCurve - Curve to adjust Y Axis

    • XboxGamepad

      public XboxGamepad(int port, Curve lxCurve, Curve lyCurve, Curve rxCurve, Curve ryCurve)
      Create with separate curves for left and right
      Parameters:
      port - DS Port of gamepad
      lxCurve - Curve to adjust left thumbstick X Axis
      lyCurve - Curve to adjust left thumbstick Y Axis
      rxCurve - Curve to adjust right thumbstick X Axis
      ryCurve - Curve to adjust right thumbstick Y Axis
